titleStmt.title: Ansvvere to the petitions of the traytours and rebelles in Lyncolneshyre
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon.
Identified as STC 15650 on UMI microfilm.
Leaves cropped at head with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
